item.title: New Mining Bill Permitting Cross-Border Crypto Payments Filed in Russian Parliament
item.description: New Mining Bill Permitting Cross-Border Crypto Payments Filed in Russian Parliament A draft law designed to regulate the mining of digital coins in Russia is also legalizing the use of cryptocurrencies in international settlements.
